Articles.Content:
To tide you over while I work on my [Vostok replica](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29) I will release a Flying car! Yes you heard that right! A flying car!

She's a real beaut isn't she?

![Fg6gw8q.png](http://i.imgur.com/Fg6gw8q.png)

Pics:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/NRqP3)

It's a VTOL.

2x timewarp for drifting action!

Action group 1 to go from VTOL to boost mode.

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Flying-car)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:14:07Z" title="06/27/2015 03:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
